dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4403274N] LEGAL ATTENTION MANAGING DIRECTOR THEPLANET.COM TTVNOL.COM
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 12:27:20 p.m. (GMT-6) on June
5, 2007.

Legal Response Team

Sent: Monday, June 04, 2007 10:25 PM
To: DMCA

TTVNOL.COM

Date: Tue, 5 Jun 2007 01:04:28 +0100 (BST) 
From: Chris R Slater <funnypoetbob@yahoo.co.uk> 
Subject: LEGAL ATTENTION MANAGING DIRECTOR THEPLANET.COM TTVNOL.COM 
To: webmaster@ttvnol.com, admins@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com, 
  copyright@theplanet.com, registrar@theplanet.com 
MIME-Version: 1.0 
Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="0-619463220-1181001868=:11469" 
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit 
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 05 Jun 2007 00:04:45.0793 (UTC) FILETIME=[200FCD10:01C7A705] 

 (multipart/alternative) 
MIME element (text/plain) 
webmaster@ttvnol.com, admins@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com,
copyright@theplanet.com, registrar@theplanet.com 
  You have been sent these same matters many times before, YOU  are the host masters
of TTNVOL.COM.  
  as host master for TTVNOL.com YOU are ignoring endless copyright notices failing
to reply or resolve and as such they deserve criminal investigation for breach of
the law without any questionable doubt or hesitation 
  This matter has now gone on for so long a period of time and I have been given
such run around by THEPLANET.COM AND TTVNOL.com alike that this matter now
warrants criminal action and arrest of all concerned and that they are brought
before a court and prosecuted and imprisoned. 
  If this matter is not resolved by all concerned THEPLANET.COM .com  TTVNOL.com
mark my words I will ensure the entire global community sees the criminal case I
make out of this and that both SITE AND DOMAIN MANAGERS will be closed down for
crimes breaching every nations law with intent to procure traffic and search
engine ranking to their customers and hence their own services through deliberate
illegal use of copyright material 
    
    
  Three weeks solid you have failed to deal with this MATTER and the site owner has
failed to remove the material or EVEN MAKE reply.  
    
  THEPLANET.COM SEND ENDLESS AUTO RESPONDERS THEN SIMPLY DO ABSULUTELY NOTHING TO
RECTIFLY THIS,THIS IS A CLEARLY DELIBERATE CRIMINAL ACT IN THEIR PART. 
    
  IT IS A CRIMINAL ACT TO KNOWINGLY PROCURE WEB SITE POPULARITY VIA ILLEGAL USE OF
STOLEN POPULAR MATERIAL TO SOLICIT SEARCH ENGINE RANKINGS AND VISITORS TO SERVERS 

    
  I AIM TO SEE COMPENSATION NOW ON A DAILY BASIS FROM ALL ONLINE AGENCIES ASSOCIATED
WITH THIS WEB SITE AND THE CRIME COMMITED RESULTING IN CRIMINAL CHARGES TO ALL
ASSOCIATED DOMAIN MANAGERS. 
    
  Material has illegally been taken, by below shown person using your services, This
was taken from our Greeting Card web site, despite clearly being marked and
identified, quite visibly ChrisRS
